name: SegwayNavimow
0:
”Alexa, ask segway robot to start mowing now”
”Alexa, ask segway robot to stop working”
”Alexa, ask segway robot to return to the charging station”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: segway robot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows you to remotely control your Segway robot mower via voice commands. It includes controlling the start and stop of the mower, checking its current status, remaining battery level, and more.

Such as:
Alexa, ask segway robot to start mowing now.
Alexa, ask segway robot to stop working.
Alexa, ask segway robot to return to the charging station.
Alexa, ask segway robot for current task.
Alexa, ask segway robot for battery level.

Explore more launch phrases on your own.
